metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3944 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The Authentication component in TYPO3 6.2.0 before 6.2.3 does not properlyinvalidate timed out user sessions, which allows remote attackers to bypassauthentication via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: typo3-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
